BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes, S.6972, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.7817, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to certain lung disabilities incurred by members of the New York city transit authority in certain cases”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Certain lung disabilities incurred by members of the NYC transit authority in certain cases. (S.6972/A.7817)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes, S.6976, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.7727, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members”.

Items.MatterName: Amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members. (S.6976/ A.7727)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Hoylman, Benjamin, Biaggi, Gounardes, Jackson, Myrie, Rivera, Salazar, Sepulveda, S.524-A, and Assembly Members Gottfried, Carroll, Seawright, Simon, Gonzalez-Rojas, Burdick, Gallagher, Paulin, Dinowitz, Epstein, Glick, Hevesi, McDonough, Davila, A.4655-A, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing speed limits in cities with populations in excess of one million people”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing speed limits in cities with populations in excess of one million people. (S.524-A/ A.4655-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Kavanagh, S.2740-B, and Assembly Members Simon, Forrest, et al., A.2316-A, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to establishing a demonstration program on interstate route 278 in Kings county to enforce vehicle weight restriction on such interstate by means of mobile or stationary weigh in motion systems; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing a demonstration program on interstate route 278 in Kings county to enforce vehicle weight restriction. (S.2740-B/A.2316-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Comrie and Liu, S.3258, and Assembly Members Richardson, Reyes and Sayegh, A.7148, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to a fine for parked or unattended semitrailers or trailers on streets of a city with a population of one million or more”.

Items.MatterName: A fine for parked or unattended semitrailers or trailers on streets of a city with a population of one million or more. (S.3258/ A.7148)
